book.synopsis: During World War II, Cicely Winterbourne, an employee of Bletchley Park and decoder of secret messages, comes into possession of information that could save her country, but get her killed, forcing her to place her trust in Inspector Fielding of Scotland Yard. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 4.5 Inches, Length: 7 Inches, Weight: 0.45 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
